works.complaint:
a.            The website states: "21st Century Eminis
 
is what I would say another scam from the Jamie McIntyre Scams long list.
I  
must also say that I didn't know how bad this guy was and how many other  
businesses he's marketing and consequently scamming people."

The site suggests that 21st Century Academy is running, and has run a long
 
list of scams that they are currently marketing to people.

b.            21st Century Academy is not a "scam company". I have never  
operated a scam. I have not been charged, arrested, or convicted of any  
dishonesty offence. I would not be involved with any offences of this  
nature.

This is a comment designed to harm my business, a small company employing 

less than 10 people.

c.             These comments harm my reputation in and cause damage to my
 
business. The publishers and distributors of this material would be liable
 
for civil damages under the Defamation Act 2005 (Qld). Due to the possible
 
retaliation, and threat to my safety caused by that the claims that in am 

engaged in criminal enterprises, this violates Criminal defamation
sections  
of Criminal Code Act 1899 (Qld).

This content has been posted many times in an atempt to further damage my 

reputation.
